name: DOOR GAME
description:
Move - Arrows
Action button - Z
Use some items - X

This game is for my nieces and nephews for Christmas 2020. Merry Christmas to you!
It's based on a drawing game I used to play with my siblings growing up and now play with their kids.
It was made with Chris Maltby's GBStudio 2 Beta. The character "Wink" is from Max Oakland's world. You can find Wink here: https://maxoakland.itch.io/wink-gameboy.
Enjoy!


[Updated 12/27/20:
- Added saving when new level starts, loading at beginning.
- Moved ghost, added more ladder and platform in Level7]
